King among all other FPS games by rewarding reaction time and strategy.

Honestly, one of the best game to ever exist. This is a game that has variety of ways to have fun and it is the perfect game for the competitiveness you've been looking for. The only thing I have to mention is, yes, this game's movement and shooting is different from any other game. It will be difficult to start and you may not like the game at first. Practice, get used to the games mechanics and you will not regret the time you spend on this game.
Es bueno, pero necesitan mejorar el Anti-Hackers
this game is great with persons who are just looking for ways to relieve stress.

This game would be great if you could play without everyone else hacking and quoting Ashida Kim like he is legit. And if you try hacking guess what, it only makes you equal to everyone else and then you get vac banned like everyone else. Save your money.

CS: GO, 
 A game where, beginner's luck doesn't exist. Playing this game especially with friends who are very much into competitive matches has made my mental decline severely due to the skill gap between players who are new and who've played constantly. With practice and months of playing I know I can improve drastically but no matter what skill level or rank you are the toxicity will always linger and be evident. Just not enjoyable to win or lose due to simple fact that people on your team (enemy included) will flame you for making mistakes or doing poorly.
